meanings.definition: A social gathering of invited guests.
meanings.sent1: I had a fun party with my friends last weekend.
meanings.sent2: The birthday party had balloons and cake.
meanings.sent3: The party was so lively with music and dancing.
meanings.sent4: The party of colors in the sky during sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The party at the park was filled with laughter and joy.

meanings.sent1: The political party held a rally to support their candidate.
meanings.sent2: The two main parties in the country have different ideologies.
meanings.sent3: The party's campaign promises were quite ambitious.
meanings.sent4: The party of ideas clashed in a debate on national television.
meanings.sent5: The party's influence extended to various regions of the country.

meanings.definition: One of the people taking part in a legal agreement or transaction.
meanings.sent1: Each party involved in the contract signed their name.
meanings.sent2: The buyer and seller were the two parties in the real estate deal.
meanings.sent3: The party agreed to the terms and conditions of the agreement.
meanings.sent4: The party of signatures on the document made it official.
meanings.sent5: The party in the negotiation was satisfied with the outcome.
